content: Backdrop's core menu blocks has some of the features of D7 contrib module Menu Block https://www.drupal.org/project/menu_block but it's missing being able to have it "follow" the active trail. Unless I'm missing something. Screenshot-from-2020-11-04-16-43-07.png
Looks like in D8 it also has some of menu block in core but is missing the same thing
